dublin_core.dcvalue: Digital communication offers advantages and challenges to dental practice As dentistry becomes comfortable with this technology it is essential that commercial and other values not be accepted on a par with professional ones and that the traditional dentist patient relationship not be compromised by inserting third parties that introduce nonprofessional standards The Officers and Regents of the American College of Dentist have prepared this background and position paper as a guide to the ethical use of digital communication in dental practice
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-06T16:33:17Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2013-05-09
The Journal of the American College of Dentists
Position paper on digital communication in dentistry.
